metadata.title: CVE-2024-3096 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
In PHP version 8.1.* before 8.1.28, 8.2.* before 8.2.18, 8.3.* before8.3.5, if a password stored with password_hash() starts with a null byte(\x00), testing a blank string as the password via password_verify() willincorrectly return true.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-3096` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.4 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.17
libapache2-mod-php8.0 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.17
libapache2-mod-php8.1 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.17
libphp8.1-embed - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.17
php8.1 - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.17
php8.1-bcmath - 8.1.2-1ubuntu2.17
